long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will retrieve the OTP while logging into the pre defined ott app on browser, for which secure access is provided by a trusted friend. Once you enter credentials of your friend on any app which require otp to login and if they given access for this app, you will receive otp on you browser as toast from their device.
